professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in database management, administration, and optimization. Proficient in Oracle, MySQL, MS SQL Server, and other database tools. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to manage and optimize database performance across various environments.

key_responsibilities: Administering and optimizing Oracle and MySQL databases to ensure high performance.
Performing regular backups and disaster recovery implementations.
Monitoring database activities and addressing issues proactively.
Providing technical support for end-users across various platforms.
Configuring and maintaining workstations and servers.
Performing hardware and software installations and upgrades.
Analyzing and optimizing database structures for better performance.
Assisting in migration and integration of databases.
Implementing backup solutions and ensuring data integrity.
